files.patch:

@@ -71,12 +71,0 @@
-/*
- * @test
- * @bug 8015739

- * and corners of the border.

- * @run main/othervm -Dsun.java2d.uiScale=1 InternalFrameBorderTest
- * @run main/othervm -Dsun.java2d.uiScale=2 InternalFrameBorderTest
- */
